room_title: Escape room "Poe's Legacy" by Exitus Escape Rooms in Salem
room_description: Maximillian Abre's bestsellers used to be headliners in the literary world, until one day he just fell off the face of the earth for several years. The famous author is making a comeback: your editor-in-chief has just received a telegram encouraging you to catch Mac Abre for an interview. Weaving through his mad-house of riddles and the supernatural horrors, you must unravel the truth and escape with your sanity!
